examples.korean: People gather in Time’s Square to watch the ball drop. 발음듣기 사람들은 볼 드랍을 보기 위해 광장에 정시에 모인다. EDU TIMES
examples.english: People gather in Time’s Square to watch the ball drop. 발음

examples.korean: It is also common for people to kiss their loved ones when the ball drops. 발음듣기 볼 드랍을 할 때 사랑하는 사람에게 키스를 하는 것 역시 흔한 광경이다. EDU TIMES
examples.english: It is also common for people to kiss their loved ones when the ball drops. 발음

examples.korean: In the U.S., the most famous New Year’s tradition is the “ball drop.” 발음듣기 미국에서는 가장 유명한 새해 전통은 “볼 드랍”이다. EDU TIMES
examples.english: In the U.S., the most famous New Year’s tradition is the “ball drop.” 발음

examples.korean: The climber slipped and dropped to his death. 발음듣기 그 등산객은 발이 미끄러져서 떨어져 죽었다[추락사했다]. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The climber slipped and dropped to his death. 발음

examples.korean: In November the temperatures drop and the days shorten. 발음듣기 11월에는 기온이 내려가고 날[낮]은 짧아진다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: In November the temperatures drop and the days shorten. 발음
